1.title: Dumm gelaufen
1.plot: Hospitalized after a cardiac crisis, recovering Edwin is bored to death and makes visit-forced Hui act as his partner on the spot to inform him about the latest possible murder case. Fabian Riem claims he killed his wife presuming it was a nocturnal robber. Dr. Rosalind Schmidt discretely joins Edwin's informal investigation, which extends to a second corpse: the robber who operated in the neighborhood since weeks, but isn't necessarily the same or related, so motives are crucial.

2.title: Es ist alles in Ordnung
2.plot: Günter duly suspects Edwin of enjoying being waited on hand and foot by Heidrun to doge dreary dusty files work. Indeed Edwin returns to the precinct when the corpse is found of apparently relapsed ex-junkie Julius Grating, who seemingly started dealing the drugs found on him in the youth center where he volunteered. Julius was thrown out by his despairing parents, but model-brother Bastian Grating, a self-supporting law student, swears he achieved full detox by taking Julius in for months, which his autopsy confirms. The team must trace he drugs and work out who set ...

3.title: Auf die Plätze
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Gut für die Gerechtigkeit
4.plot: After a bare breast feminist protest in Femen style, also in central Cologne, radical youngster Lisa Rossmann is found murdered on the street. Chief Plocher, Vicky Adam and Hui fail to keep Edwin and Günter out of the case, duly fearing PC nonsense from the press, but the seniors agree it's wiser to make young, sensitive minority member Hui their spokesman. First suspect is Lisa's long-term stalker, who proves inoffensive. Even the NGO officials -she supported other causes, like the homeless- consider her methods excessive, but the team finds alternative tracks ...

5.title: Ein Schuss, zwei Treffer
5.plot: A masterly shot at a couple making love in a car pierces the man to hospital, his lover fatally. Survivor Peter Schmitz is a popular call-boy, whose wife agreed while clients recommended him to each-other, but this was a loving freebie, adding his wife Anja to a long suspect list of cheated partners. Or was she the target? While Günter wrestles with modern (im)morality, Edwin drives 'brother' Hui to despair after a DNA test shows he has some Chinese ancestors.

6.title: 1A-Stimmung
6.plot:

7.title: Wie man's macht
7.plot:

8.title: Bankgeheimnis
8.plot: A supermarket client finds in her car boot the corpse of a corporate bank merger executive, who should be on a business flight to Ireland, and whose equally discrete workaholic boss -having demand a court order- claims to know nothing about his Kuala Lumpur trip plans. Hui discovers he was a regular client a dominatrix studio, whose client list includes the police chief. Coroner Rosalind Schmidt volunteers for an undercover mission, which proves crucially dangerous.

9.title: Willkommen im Chaos
9.plot: In the chaos while the precinct moves to new premises, a biotech entrepreneur's fatal car accident file lands with murder detectives Günter and Edwin, who jump on it to be spared helping settling into the new offices. Hui Ko links it with the also accidentally delivered file of a theft of toxic spiders, as the coroner finds one did bite the businessman, so they check out his partners, who may all have been targets of suspicious incidents, and the revolutionary cloning-prone human genetic technology.

4.title: Das Würfelspiel
4.plot: Just-graduated buddies Thilo, Jannek and Gordon Gremberg get drunk and high from a 'mystery cocktail' in a Cologne nightclub. Next morning Thilo's corpse lies by the road, after a beating and fatal fall. Gordon is on intensive care for his OD trip, with a broken foot having jumped off the Mülheimer bridge. Jannek's mother hesitates letting the cops question him in bed, apparently believing his bones all disappeared, but he's taken to the precinct to indicate where the knaves could have bought the drugs or be spiked. Edwin and Günter are surprised that intern Hui Ko, ...

5.title: Einer ist immer der Loser
5.plot: After the police jubilee party, chief Plocher and state attorney Wagenknecht arrive in the underground parking lot, where they find a shot corpse and commend the prompt handling by commissioner Feller, who leaves to bring the bagged evidence to the lab. When detectives Edwin Bremer and Günter Hoffmann arrive, they realize there is no cop Feller so the brass probably let the culprit clear his murder scene and are charged with clearing the case discretely. Victim Dr. Oliver Körfer is also the psychotherapist of Heidrun, Günter's wife, and she demands his 'obvious ...

6.title: Atemlos durch die Nacht
6.plot: Dodgy lawyer Milz sees no other way to prevent his crime baron client being convicted for murder then disposing of the key witness, Karla Neuhaus, but she's under police protection in a safe-house. So he calls his marker on gambling-indebted prosecution officer Hanno to see the protection is declared compromised and leak the new location, Milz can then arrange a killer. Thus Karla is transferred and given new protectors: pensioner cops Edwin and Günter, who soon smell a rat. While they ask Hui Ko and Zdams to look into the referral, killer Thomas is hired to attack ...

7.title: Keine ruhige Minute
7.plot:

8.title: Neue Männer braucht das Land

1.title: Junimond
1.plot: Found in a single villa, the senior cops must examine the deaths of somewhat unpopular forensic doctor Körfer and a much younger Mrs. Weiss. Körfer was actually far more humane then they imagined, his successor Rosalind Schmidt capable and charming. Hui Ko quickly suspects Weiss's husband and is flattered to get field work checking him out, which even leads to his arrest. However the case in convoluted, with affairs and manufactured alibis, also involving Weiss's female buddy, and the cases' link is just too coincidental.

2.title: Echte Freunde
2.plot: A man bleeds to death, stabbed in his beer pub, yet none of his mates admits having seen the murder or knowing a possible motive. The next morning, all six make confessions invoking bogus motives. Their wives, including the widow, also stonewall Edwin, Günter, Hui and Adam, who must work out why they conspire and set a suitable trap.

3.title: Wolke 4
3.plot: Günter and Edwin's next victim is a corpse find by the Rhine, of a mid thirties woman, whose dating-app enabled a busy sex life, a scary surprise for her naive partner. Alas for Hui Ko and Vicky, that means screening many lovers as potential victims, including Gunther's son in law Hanno's first client, with a special twist for a HIV-infected ex.

4.title: Der Kommissar
4.plot: While shopping with wife Heidrun, Günter catches shy simpleton repeat-'petty' criminal Mirco Schulze cracking car lock, but is knocked down by Mirco's younger, but bigger and mean brother Kevin and abducted to their bossy mother's farm. Due to the cranial blow, he suffers amnesia and seeing a misleading arrest picture in the Cologne newspaper comes to believe he's a recently arrested master jewel thief and the knaves' father, so he takes over planning the next heist, which is not to Kevin's liking. Edwin soon realizes his mate must be in serious danger and moves ...

5.title: So lang wir noch am Leben sind
5.plot: On Edwin's hated birthday, the mostly merry widower dodges all festivities and drags Günter along to attend the Cologne billiard tournament starring Dutch champion René Vandervelde. Edwin believes his cynical cake candles blowing wish comes true when they arrive at the murder scene before junior Hui Ko, as the venue cafe manager Rolf Althaus is found minutes later, fatally stabbed with his letter opener. Forensics rules against suicide, although he was virtually bankrupt and found out his wife, whose income covered the loss, has an 'innocent platonic' affair with his ...

6.title: Niemals geht man so ganz
6.plot: Günter believes the Wermel spouses committed suicide by OD because of the husband's incurable Alzheimer. However, Edwin bets -for their facial hair- it's murder, suspecting the co-heir offspring. Son Jan, whose shop was bought with parental capital, and screw-up Goth daughter Stefanie, in debts as usual. The team finds out both kept secrets, like their parents, forcing the cops to reconsiders motives and opportunity.

7.title: Uns trennt das Leben
7.plot: Young athlete, who was hospitalized with a broke arm after a car accident, dies there from unprovoked cardiac arrest. His sister Sophie cries murder, Edwin and Günter see no evidence, dismissing Hui Ko's bad feeling about the improbable coincidence. When the accident culprit turns himself in, and admits having been paid to hit the youngster, all cops agree that's no bad luck. Yet they lack suspect and MO, until they learn the victim's organs were donated and speculate a life-rescued receiver may have orchestrated it all, presumably with a medical insider accomplice.

8.title: Immer wieder geht die Sonne auf
8.plot: Art gallery keeper Patrick Wilke is beaten to death at home. His business partner points at madly jealous fresh widow Anika Wilke, who claims amnesia. Edwin arrest her, ignoring doubts from Günter and supervisor Vicky, who is trough tolerating Edwin's constant self-righteous insubordination regardless of law and regulations, reporting him to chief Ploch. Meanwhile business and private motives are investigated.

9.title: Im Wagen vor mir
9.plot: Edwin is suspended pending disciplinary procedure for self-righteous insubordination, but refuses to but out of work. He probes Günter and Heidrun as regular supper guest, to the grand-kids' amusement. Günter is not amused that Edwin, who was contacted in panic by his retired dentist Willi Lantermann, conducts his informal investigation for the fatal stabbing in the wood of a serial rapist, whose presumed latest victim was hit and run by Lantermann, who picked up the presumed murder weapon, a hunting knife, which checks out in forensics, also below the counter. Günter...

10.title: Gute Nacht, Freunde
10.plot: Reinstated Edwin and worried Günter interview two girl IT students who took in after a campus party a man they discovered died from cardiac arrest on their couch. He posed as Chicago exchange med student "Connor" but fits no such profile, being too old, and Dr. Schmidt's forensic autopsy later find he was administered an OD. Thus chief Plocher, who was eager to close the case a non-criminal, finding a colored foreigner' death 'inappropriate' enough, to (re)open it as the seniors and Hui Ko wanted. The victim is identified as an IT consultancy whiz and linked to a ...

11.title: Freiheit
11.plot: At his 70th birthday party, Achim Wagner and his son in law die from the same poisoned barbecued steak. Their wives are vegetarians, hence suspect. Achim hired a P.I. to follow his son in law, but wasn't told, nor the authorities, about the pregnant daughter's regular beatings before. Achim has terminal cancer, which he never told his doted girl, but his wife knew. Edwin and Günter are inspired, although over-enthusiastically, by their own family who enjoy playing crime author on 'our case'.

12.title: Ein ehrenwertes Haus
12.plot: Günter and Edwin solve the murder of salesman Brenner, who traded in dubious stuff: magnetic bracelets, esoteric attributes and food substitutes. His widow show no emotion, just concern who will pays the bill s for her and their four brat daughters, he was rarely home. Brenners phone records lead to his love nest, staged as a family home, but he's no bigamist, just had serial dates, notable with gullible female clients. The detectives wade trough a long suspect list, only to land sideways, while dealing with their own home stress, making good use of the free love nest...

13.title: Liebesspieler
13.plot: Edwin and Günter question shy small fry Lutz Michel, who was easily caught, without loot, after the robbing of a small bank branch, which the knocked-down banker assures was carried put by several unidentified men, of whom no trace is found, Lutz claims there were none. Physically provoked by ever-cocky Edwin, Michel seizes his service gun, which he wore against regulations, and takes both retired cops hostage. Precinct CO Plocher temporizes demonstrating their working conditions to national police union executive Rainer Wendt, but passes out after eating the pizzas ...

14.title: Eine Art Magie
14.plot: Escape artist Kalisto's sword trough coffin trick fatally stabs his lush public assistant Sabine 'Morgana' Kowalski. Her twin sister and secret assistant Ushi cries murder and reports missing intakes, forensics conclude sabotage. *Edwin and Günter wade trough confusing alibis and motives as it turns out Kalisto, his mentor "Große Maldini" and the sisters mutually bugged each-other over (tax) fraud, disloyalty and blackmail. Witkamp's stabbing in his car shortly before only seems unrelated, primes suspect is his pickpocket cahoot Linus Geschke. Meanwhile Edwin ...

15.title: Aus dem Beton
15.plot: Ex-con Teddy's parole officer was fatally shot in a sky-rise social apartments block, the gun fund nearby with Teddy's fingerprints. Günter and Edwin got him jailed for non-violent crimes and believe him innocent of murder. His girlfriend Chantalle, who allegedly got Teddy on the right track, provides him with an alibi, but has her own sinful record. When a second parole officer is murdered, Günter and Edwin fear a greater plot. Son in law Hanno, whom Günter asked to accept Teddy's defense, gets more out of Chantalle.

16.title: Engel 07
16.plot: Handsome young Gabriel Ruthe crashes to his death from a high building, right in front of devout simpleton Maria Frobel, whom Hui Ko dismisses as laughable airhead for assuming from the white feathers on his back it's her guardian angel. Edwin and Günther rebuke Hui Ko's assumptions, including suicide, although Gabriel's girl friend recently broke with him, but was actually dumped, with her gay housemate Benny Müller in a surprising part. Edwin's cardiac troubles can no longer stay hidden.

imdb.title: Rentnercops: Jeder Tag zählt!
plot: Faced with staff shortages, the chief of a Cologne police department convinces two retired homicide detectives to come back into the force. With their immediate superior being a young woman, a generational cultural clash is inevitable.
